title: Is it possible to disable the "Raise volume above recommended level?" message?
content:
Is there a way to turn-off this feature?

Your volume will suddenly reduce to a very-quiet level, very irritating if you are cycling, jogging, at the gym, etc, and so-on so you have to break what you're doing to address.

When you start to increase the volume, you get the attached message. Regardless of how many times I tap OK, at random times the phone will still suddenly reduce the volume and show me this disclaimer again.

Could Google please add a checkbox labelled "don't show again" please.
